name: Runaway Duffy
description:
Maybe running away from home wasn't the best idea…
Because he can't fly, Duffy has to jump from block to block across a forest full of tricky obstacles and deadly enemies. Jumping is exhausting though! The higher Duffy has to jump the more energy he uses, but perfect jumps can help Duffy recover health and earn extra coins. Use the coins you collect to unlock new costumes with special powers! Play Story Mode to help Duffy find his way back home, or unlock endless levels in Challenge Mode and compete to become the champion of the woods!

Features:
- Over 80 levels
- 3 types Endless Challenges
- Over 120 Costumes to unlock
- Beautiful graphics and original soundtrack
- Simple but challenging gameplay

Have fun, and don't forget to rate us!
